author: erodriguez
msg: Bumping up Change Password protocol version to 0.5.1 to begin tracking as its own project in JIRA and since it utilizes much of the Kerberos infrastructure (which is already version 0.5.1).

author: erodriguez
msg: Updated changepw-protocol to use kerberos-common cipher hashed adapter, DIRCHANGEPW-1:
o  Added hashed adapter to chain context and chain configuration.
o  Deployed seal() and unseal() methods to password change processing, auth header verification, and reply sealing.

author: imario
msg: enh: add datatimeout configuration for ftp

author: erodriguez
msg: Logging update to Change Password protocol:
o  Added debug log of message and stack trace during chain exception.
o  Added info log of just exception message during chain exception.

author: imario
msg: enh: add datatimeout configuration for ftp
